name: switcher-activation
objective: Switcher button for activation is visible
description: Switcher button for enable/disable the Bluetooth technology is visible in the Bluetooth panel UI.

steps.description: Open the Bluetooth panel of gnome-control-center
steps.expected: Window of the Bluetooth panel appears with the activation switcher button

author: zingile

name: switcher-visibility
objective: Switcher button for visibility is visible
description: Switch button for enable/disable the visibility of the device is visible in the Bluetooth panel UI.

steps.description: Open the Bluetooth panel of gnome-control-center
steps.expected: Window of the Bluetooth panel appears with the activation visibility switcher button

author: zingile

name: button-add-remove
objective: Add and remove buttons are visible
description: Add/remove button for add/remove an other Bluetooth device is visible in the Bluetooth panel UI.

steps.description: Open the Bluetooth panel of gnome-control-center
steps.expected: Window of the Bluetooth panel appears with the add/remove button

author: zingile
